title: To Make A Move North, Burger King Eyes Buying A Canadian Icon
teaser: The fast-food restaurant operator Burger King has announced that it's in talks to buy Tim Horton's, a Canadian chain of restaurants. The acquisition would likely herald the move of Burger King's headquarters to Canada, in an attempted tax inversion.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
